document.full_text: the star witness in the u.s. case against the accused planners of the 2008 attacks on mumbai said on tuesday that the list of targets changed as the raids grew near, irritating his pakistani intelligence contact.
document.title: plotters shifted mumbai targets: u.s. trial witness
lines_and_colors: the star witness in the u.s. case against the accused planners of the 2008 attacks on mumbai said on tuesday that the list of targets changed as the raids grew near, irritating his pakistani intelligence contact.
